name: breakmate

scripts.dev:main: npm run build:main && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron .
scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:renderer
scripts.build:mac: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-forge make --platform darwin
scripts.build:mac:arm64: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-forge make --platform darwin --arch arm64
scripts.build:mac:x64: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-forge make --platform darwin --arch x64
scripts.build:mac:universal: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-forge make --platform darwin --arch universal
scripts.build:win:x64: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-forge make --platform win32 --arch x64
scripts.build:win:arm64: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-forge make --platform win32 --arch arm64
scripts.package:mac: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-forge package --platform darwin

author: Pushpendra Upadhyay
description: A free and open-source desktop application for digital wellness and healthy screen habits.
